docs.snippet: Although little is heard of them in this country, developments of great significance and, in fact, comparable to the events of the great consolidation period in this country which culminated in the Northern Securities decision, are taking place among...
docs.lead_paragraph: Although little is heard of them in this country, developments of great significance and, in fact, comparable to the events of the great consolidation period in this country which culminated in the Northern Securities decision, are taking place among the transportation systems of South America.

headline.main: BIG SOUTHERN PLANS; Amalgamations Under Way in Southern Republics Like Those of the Harriman Era Here.

docs.snippet: The weakness exhibited by St. Paul on Friday was still in evidence yesterday morning, and the stock broke below par soon after the opening. Under pressure of heavy offerings the issue sold down to 99 3/8, its lowest point since 1907. The balance of...
docs.lead_paragraph: The weakness exhibited by St. Paul on Friday was still in evidence yesterday morning, and the stock broke below par soon after the opening. Under pressure of heavy offerings the issue sold down to 99 3/8, its lowest point since 1907. The balance of the list was weak in sympathy, but St. Paul soon rallied and its close, at 100 1/2, showed a gain of 1/8 from Friday's last price.

docs.snippet: According to cable advices from London received in the New York crude rubber market at 10 A.M. yesterday, 3 P.M. London time, only 120 of the 625 tons of plantation rubber offered at auction there had been taken. Prices realized, however, were...
docs.lead_paragraph: According to cable advices from London received in the New York crude rubber market at 10 A.M. yesterday, 3 P.M. London time, only 120 of the 625 tons of plantation rubber offered at auction there had been taken. Prices realized, however, were generally good, having shown an advance of 1 to 2 cents per pound of those secured at the last previous sale.

headline.main: RUBBER PRICES FIRM.; Trade Encouraged, Though Latest London Offering Was Not Well Taken.
PAN-AMERICAN TRADE GROWS; Increase In Exports to Chile 94 Per Cent. Greater Than Previous Year.

docs.snippet: The enormous profits made by the American Tobacco Company and its separated companies have received so much publicity that it will be strange if many manufacturers do not accept the implied invitation of the Supreme Court's decision to get into the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The enormous profits made by the American Tobacco Company and its separated companies have received so much publicity that it will be strange if many manufacturers do not accept the implied invitation of the Supreme Court's decision to get into the field in competition with the older companies.

docs.snippet: UNCLE SAM may well be proud of his riflemen these days, for in the last three months they have been victorious in three widely separated parts of the world, and this country holds at present nearly all of the international rifle shooting world's...
docs.lead_paragraph: UNCLE SAM may well be proud of his riflemen these days, for in the last three months they have been victorious in three widely separated parts of the world, and this country holds at present nearly all of the international rifle shooting world's championships that exist.

headline.main: UNCLE SAM LEADS THE WORLD IN RIFLE SHOOTING
